name: No Heroes Allowed:No Puzzles Either! G
name_original: No Heroes Allowed:No Puzzles Either! G
description: The legend is to be unearthed! Full of familiar bridges of RPG , the unique game「hero is too arrogant 」series, which is now full of hunting block, and is fully resurrected on the Android. The player must destroy the block with his pickel, so that he can summon the monster to fight back「hero」, who go closer to the puzzle. In addition, you can「catch」 the hero, 「dig」new monster and magic objects, and 「evolution」 the monster Legion, with your original powerful Legion to deal with those who are too arrogant!
